mapper.select: select * from review where mEmail = #{mEmail} and rDrop = 'N'
select sum(A) from (select count(*) A from qnaboard where memail=#{memail} and qnadrop != 'Y' union select count(*) A from qnareply where memail=#{memail} and qrdrop != 'Y')

select * from (select rownum rnum, A.* from (select * from (select qnaboard.*,0 as qrid, null as qrreg, null as qrdrop from qnaboard union select qid, memail, null as qnatitle, null as qnacontent, null as qnaorifile,null as qnareg,null as qnadrop, 'Y' as qnayn,qrid,qrreg,qrdrop from qnareply) where memail=#{memail} and (qnadrop != 'Y' or qrdrop != 'Y') order by qid DESC, qrid asc) A) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select rownum rnum,qnaboard.* from qnaboard where qid=#{qid}
select qrid from qnareply where qid=#{qid} and qrid!=0
select rownum rnum,qnareply.* from qnareply where qrid=#{qrid}
mapper.update: update qnaboard set qnadrop='Y' where qid=#{qid}
update qnareply set qrdrop='Y' where qid=#{qid}
update review set rdrop = 'Y' where rid = #{rid}
update orderdetail set odstatus = 2 where odid = #{odid}
